ReviewList.Text: It's another of Gini's Alien novels. Nuf said!  It's a shame she can't write at hyperspeed. When the next one?

Kitty takes an unplanned trip to the Alpha Centaury galaxy, and is thrown into a civil war. Meet the rest of the denizens of the populated planets and wow there are some big surprises. I love the Kitty/ Alien series if you haven't read any take the time and start at the beginning, you will love each one and devour them till your at the end of this book groaning about waiting till December for next book.

The 11th in a the series and Gini Koch is still rocking Kitty and her crew. Started like I expected then it went out of this world. If you're a fan you'll love it and if you aren't where have you been. If you are just starting you need to start with Touched by An Alien.  This is fun series that makes you want a poofie at the very least.

Ever read a book so much you don't want it to end.  This is one of those books, Kitty and the gang are back kicking A all the way. Hate that Chuckie continues to hurt, wish Cliff great agony.  Cannot just cannot wait for the next in the series.
I got into reading Ms. Koch books by accident lol I am truly happy to say I love this entire series. I can't wait for the next one
She looses me sometimes in the action. The sex is too much.

Fantastic read!  I especially liked this one because it was not on Earth.  The action was fabulous .  The fights and battles did not disappoint .  Those characters, we'll just great as usual.  Didn't think the " family " could grow anymore, but it did !  Loved all of the aliens old and new.  Some of the twists and surprises were out of this world, pun intended.  You just gotta read this one!!
Absolutely LOVE this series by Gini Koch. The humor is non-stop, as is the action. I don't often enjoy novels written in first person perspective but Gini Koch really makes it work!
